summary: A hidden artefact of the dark brotherhood, said to have been cast into the world by Sithis himself.
descriptionHtml:
Lore:
Said to be a mask from the void, worn by the first person instructed to perform the black sacrament.

Location:
Here\'s a hint, we have secret rooms for a reason

A Mask for the dark brotherhood, using basic in game resources. Currently there\'s only one model which is the male large size. I plan on adding a female form soon, but I\'m going to just keep it as a max size object since it fits the smaller body fine.
author: HatterMaster
